          <title>
            <string language="en">Heating of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζέσταμα του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the temperature of water before heating (1),  start of heating (2), after 5 minutes of heating (3), and after 5 more minutes of heating (4).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Temperatur des Wassers 
vor Heizung (1), Anfang von Heizung (2), nach 5 Minuten von Heizung 
(3) und nach 5 weiteren Minuten von Heizung (4).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la température de 
l'eau avant le chauffage (1), début du chauffage (2), après 5 
minutes du chauffage (3), et après 5 comptes rendu supplémentaires 
du chauffage (4).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a temperatura da água 
antes do heating (1), começo do heating (2), após 5 minutos do 
heating (3), e após 5 mais minutos do heating (4).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la temperatura di 
acqua prima del heating (1), inizio del heating (2), dopo 5 minuti del
heating (3) e dopo 5 nuovi minuti del heating (4).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη θερμοκρασία του ύδατος
πρίν θερμαίνει (1), έναρξη της θέρμανσης (2), μετά από 5 λεπτά 
της θέρμανσης (3), και μετά από 5 περισσότερα λεπτά της 
θέρμανσης (4).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la temperatura del agua
antes de la calefacción (1), comienzo de la calefacción (2), 
después de 5 minutos de la calefacción (3), y después de 5 más 
minutos de la calefacción (4).</string>
          </description>
